Because nothing says love like defeating exes in epic bass battles—just your typical, everyday relationship hurdles.

alt_text: adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished
title: adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished (2018)
description: The second installment of the now iconic Original is Never Finished campaign. This shot features an upward moving Trucking Pedestal in conjunction with Duplication and a wipe transition near the end, using the pillars as a device to change characters. Unlike Conveyor shots, which move left to right along a dolly track, the pedestal moves up and down, either practically (or like in this example) with the help of post-production VFX.

description: A$AP Rocky returns as the "fashion killa" in the music video for his latest single, "A$AP Forever," featuring Moby.
